officer.title: President: Abraham Lincoln
officer.description: "Don't believe everything you see on the internet"

officer.title: Treasurer: Alexander Hamilton
officer.description: "There's a million things I haven't done. Just you wait. Just you wait."

officer.title: Communications: John 'Captain Crunch' Draper
officer.description: A pioneer of phone phreaking, he can get you a call anywhere with nothing but a whistle from Captain Crunch cereal.

officer.title: Event Chair: Flora, Fauna, and Merriweather
officer.description: They may not be able to decide if the decorations shoulc be pink or blue, but they do know how to bake a darn good cake.

officer.title: Secretary: Grace Wheelberg
officer.description: “He’s very popular, Ed. The sportos, the motorheads, geeks, sluts, bloods, wastoids, dweebies, dickheads…they all adore him. They think he's a righteous dude."
